    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()

      • staticSetting

        public void staticSetting()
        This method inicializes the staring variables and the static variables with the static variables given in the Global package and sets the bundle.

      • mainMusicStart

        public void mainMusicStart()
        This method starts the main music of the game.

      • gameStart

        public void gameStart(String name)
        This method is the starting point of the game. It creates the game frame and its panels, sets static variables of the Ball class, creates a new player, hides the main frame and start the Thread created from the controller, which implemented the Runnable interface.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player

      • threadStart

        public void threadStart()

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is the run method of the thread. It is running until the player's mistakes are less then the maximum mistakes allowed.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics g)
        Ask the objects to draw themselfs.
        Parameters:
        g -

      • update

        public void update()

      • movePaddleMouse

        public void movePaddleMouse(int x)
        This method moves the paddle with the x coordinate of the mouse.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the mouse

      • collisionCheck

        public boolean collisionCheck(int x,
                              int y)
        This method tells the ball whether it collided with the paddle or not.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the ball.
        y - the y coordinate of the ball.
        Returns:
        true - collided / false - not collided

      • ballFell

        public boolean ballFell(int y)
        This method tells the ball wether it is falling or not
        Parameters:
        y - the y coordinate of the ball.
        Returns:
        true - falling / false - not falling
